data.content:
# Writeup
## Solving step
1. Visit http://ash-chal.firebird.sh:36016/webapp/, nothing special just a flappy bird game
2. Randomly try some page that not exist   
e.g. http://ash-chal.firebird.sh:36016/webapp/haha   
server will navigate to 404 not found page
4. Found that server is host with apache tomcat
![ash-chal.firebird.sh_36016_webapp_haha.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/ash_chal_firebird_sh_36016_webapp_haha_da7f37b547.png)
5. Try go into default admin page   
with default account password (user: tomcat, pw; tomcat)   
http://ash-chal.firebird.sh:36016/manager   
success ðŸ˜‚
![ash-chal.firebird.sh_36016_manager_html_list;jsessionid=BA6CB4A35A7AF924BB2F160CA13360E2_org.apache.catalina.filters.CSRF_NONCE=1252BBFB01089214D7A4EDDEF37D569E.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/ash_chal_firebird_sh_36016_manager_html_list_jsessionid_BA_6_CB_4_A35_A7_AF_924_BB_2_F160_CA_13360_E2_org_apache_catalina_filters_CSRF_NONCE_1252_BBFB_01089214_D7_A4_EDDEF_37_D569_E_fb5bc8cb00.png)
6. In applications list, you can see `/webshell` is running, if not then start it. If you does not see any `/webshell` service, you can deploy an [web shell WAR file](https://github.com/BustedSec/webshell/blob/master/webshell.war) and run it.
![webshell-war.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/webshell_war_bfcfdf040d.png)
8. Visit http://ash-chal.firebird.sh:36016/webshell
9. Run Unix command to find the flag:
- ls -la /
- cat /flag (or http://ash-chal.firebird.sh:36016/webshell/index.jsp?cmd=cat+%2Fflag)
![webshell-1.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/webshell_1_3cc6367c25.png)
![webshell-2.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/webshell_2_1662e0f73e.png)

flag:  `firebird{d0_y0u_l1k3_fl4ppy_b1rd}`
